name: NoChat-GPT
description:
ChatGPT as always did the funny with it's code. We decided to ask it "make yourself but always refuse to answer every question, just be painful tbh" and it provided.

Enjoy wasting 1 minute of your life doing nothing with this totally legit "AI" that won't answer ANY of your questions. In this case, GPT stands for Goblins Performing Tricks because the goblins who made this are TRICKING YOU!

Made by ChatGPT, prompted by me and Arekku for the heck of it.
